video.title: The Riches
video.synopsis: An accident enables a family of grifters to assume the identities of a more affluent family, but their luxe new lives can't quite shake the past.

episodes.synopsis: The Malloys, a nomadic family of cons, decide to take over the lives and new home of a recently deceased wealthy couple.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Wayne seeks a job as a lawyer, while Dahlia makes an enemy of the head of the Edenfalls homeowner's association.
episodes.title: Believe the Lie

episodes.synopsis: Wayne deals with his first day of work, while Dahlia tries to enroll the kids in an exclusive private school.
episodes.title: Operation Education

episodes.synopsis: Wayne must deal with Doug's ex-wife, who hasn't been receiving her alimony payments.
episodes.title: Been There, Done That

episodes.synopsis: Wayne has to clean up after one of Hugh's shady land grabs. Dahlia takes Cherien's job as a dental hygienist.
episodes.title: The Big Floss

episodes.synopsis: Wayne has to deal with Ken and Dahlia at the office on the day of a difficult arbitration. Di Di is arrested for possession of marijuana.
episodes.title: Reckless Gardening

episodes.synopsis: Dale uses Earl's funeral to lure the Malloys back to the camp, and Ginny takes the opportunity to force Di Di's marriage to Ken.
episodes.title: Virgin Territory

episodes.synopsis: In order to help cover up their $40,000 theft from Hugh's safe, the Malloys con a baseball legend into investing $500,000 in Panco.
episodes.title: X Spots the Mark

episodes.synopsis: Dahlia brings home a friend from prison. Wayne must impress Hugh with a dinner party at his home in order to be made a partner.
episodes.title: Cinderella

episodes.synopsis: Wayne overdoses on meth to teach Dahlia a lesson ... and nearly unravels completely. Dale attempts to ally himself with Hartley Underwood.
episodes.title: This Is Your Brain on Drugs

episodes.synopsis: In Hugh's absence, Wayne runs Panco and finds his ethics at odds with his job. Dahlia frets that she doesn't understand Di Di anymore.
episodes.title: Anything Hugh Can Do, I Can Do Better

episodes.synopsis: Doug's friend Pete turns up for a visit, and Dahlia regrets the tactics she used to try to get rid of him.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Lie

episodes.synopsis: The noose tightens around the Malloys as Dale makes his move, and it becomes impossible to hide the truth from Nina.
episodes.title: Waiting for Dogot

episodes.synopsis: With their fabricated lives at risk in Edenfalls, Dahlia and the kids hit the road; Wayne stays behind to handle the Pete situation.
episodes.title: The Last Temptation of Wayne

episodes.synopsis: Dahlia and the kids discover that their Traveller skills have become rusty; Wayne's reluctant partnership with Dale deepens.
episodes.title: Friday Night Lights

episodes.synopsis: Fearful of losing the Bayou Hills deal, Wayne attempts to save Hugh from his depression. Cael's mischief at school forces Wayne to take charge.
episodes.title: Field of Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Living honestly isn't as easy as Dahlia had hoped; Wayne runs into trouble with Doug's past; and Cael and Di Di try to recapture their childhood.
episodes.title: Slums of Bayou Hills

episodes.synopsis: Wayne gets a surprise visitor at work; Dahlia's double life is becoming dangerous; and Cael meets other Travellers on his road trip.
episodes.title: Trust Never Sleeps

episodes.synopsis: Wayne might not be able to regain Dahlia's trust once she begins to realize how much he has lied to her about Pete; Nina throws Jim a birthday party.
episodes.title: Dead Calm

episodes.synopsis: Dahlia and Wayne face the widening gap in their relationship; the Bayou Hills deal hangs by a thread after foul play at the construction site.
episodes.title: The Lying King
